sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email"><sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><blind_copied/><body><html><head><style>
	#snc_notification_preference {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	
	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
</style>

</head><body><p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">A new <strong>CRITICAL PRIORITY NETWORK</strong> incident has been created:</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<ul style="list-style-position: inside;">
<li><strong><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Number: INC0010004</span></strong></li>
<li><strong><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Short description: Critical Priority Network Incident Test #2</span></strong></li>
<li><strong><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><a id="snc_uri_ref_link" href="https://kura-labs-jul-4728-0014.lab.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=incident.do%3Fsys_id=747a8c661c4722107f44dfbc9abe8fd4%26sysparm_stack=incident_list.do%3Fsysparm_query=active=true">LINK</a></span></strong></li>
</ul>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Please respond immediately.</span></p>

<br><br>

<a id="snc_notification_unsubscribe" href="mailto:?subject=Unsubscribe from &quot; Critical Incident Notification&quot;&amp;body=Sending this email with the predefined content in the subject and body will unsubscribe you from the notification &quot; Critical Incident Notification&quot;%0D%0A%0D%0AUnsubscribe:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;52c120ceb81622107f44046e3758c0da&quot;,&quot;token&quot;:&quot;c797e62132&quot;}">Unsubscribe</a> | <a id="snc_notification_preference" href="https://kura-labs-jul-4728-0014.lab.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=notification_preferences.do%3Fsysparm_notification=52c120ceb81622107f44046e3758c0da">Notification Preferences</a><div>&nbsp;</div><div style="display:inline">Ref:MSG0000701_HYrywhK2S1f74GgVGPIL</div></body></html></body><body_text/><checkpoint>0</checkpoint><content_type>text/html</content_type><copied/><deleted>false</deleted><direct>brendan.qin@example.com,brice.hedglin@example.com,bradly.hasselvander@example.com,alyssa.biasotti@example.com,alva.pennigton@example.com,amelia.caputo@example.com,brent.vaidya@example.com,brant.darnel@example.com,jacklyn.emayo@example.com,amos.linnan@example.com,karla.ken@example.com</direct><error_string/><headers>X-ServiceNow-Source:Notification-52c120ceb81622107f44046e3758c0da

</headers><importance>high</importance><instance>747a8c661c4722107f44dfbc9abe8fd4</instance><mailbox display_value="Outbox">outbox</mailbox><message_id/><notification_type>SMTP</notification_type><receive_type>new</receive_type><recipients>brendan.qin@example.com,brice.hedglin@example.com,bradly.hasselvander@example.com,alyssa.biasotti@example.com,alva.pennigton@example.com,amelia.caputo@example.com,brent.vaidya@example.com,brant.darnel@example.com,jacklyn.emayo@example.com,amos.linnan@example.com,karla.ken@example.com</recipients><reply_to/><state>ready</state><status/><subject>NEW: CRITICAL Network Incident INC0010004</subject><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-01 19:09:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>5caacc2a1c4722107f44dfbc9abe8fcd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-01 19:09:35</sys_updated_on><target_table>incident</target_table><type>send-ready</type><uid>N/A</uid><user/><user_id/><weight>0</weight></sys_email></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_email_58aacc2a1c4722107f44dfbc9abe8f71
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email"><sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><blind_copied/><body><html><head><style type="text/css">
	* {
		-webkit-text-size-adjust: none;
	}

	body {
		margin: 0 auto !important;
		padding: 0 !important;
		font-family: Lato, Arial, sans-serif;
	}

	.btn a {
		text-decoration: none;
	}

	.btn.inverse a {
		color: #fff;
	}

	#requestapprove a {
		color: #fff !important;
	}

	span.footer,
	#templateAddress,
	#templateCopyright,
	#templateCopyright *,
	#templateAddress * {
		margin: 0;
		font-size: 14px;
		line-height: 18px;
		color: #ffffff;
	}

	#snc_notification_unsubscribe,
	#snc_notification_preference {
		color: #3C59E7;
		font-size: 16px;
		line-height: 19px;
	}

	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		padding-right: 8px;
	}

	#snc_notification_preference {
		padding-left: 8px;
	}

	body,
	table,
	td,
	p,
	a {
		-ms-text-size-adjust: 100% !important;
		-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100% !important;
	}

	table,
	tr,
	td {
		border-spacing: 0 !important;
		mso-table-lspace: 0 !important;
		mso-table-rspace: 0 !important;
		border-collapse: collapse !important;
		mso-line-height-rule: exactly !important;
	}

	.ExternalClass * {
		line-height: 100%;
	}

	.mobile-link a,
	.mobile-link span {
		text-decoration: none !important;
		color: inherit !important;
		border: none !important;
	}
</style>
</head><body><div style="margin: 0 auto !important;" align="center">
<table class="w100" style="width: 600px; background-color: #f7f7f9; margin: 0 auto !important; padding: 0px;" border="0" width="600" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" bgcolor="#F7F7F9">
<tbody>
<tr>

<!-- CONTAINER -->

<tbody>
<!-- Main Container -->
<tr>
<td class="pad-sides-20" style="border-radius:6px;text-align: left; background-color: #ffffff; padding: 24px 24px 24px 24px;" align="center"><div style="font-family: lato, arial, sans; line-height: 24px; font-size: 16px;">
<div style="text-align: center; line-height: 36px; padding-bottom: 24px; border-bottom: 1px solid #DADDE2;"><span style="font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color: #181a1f;">We received your incident</span></div>
<div style="padding-top: 24px; padding-bottom: 16px;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Hello</span><span style="font-weight: 600; line-height: 24px;"> Abraham,<br></span></span></div>
<div style="padding-bottom: 16px;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">We created <span style="font-weight: bold;">INC0010004</span> to handle your recent incident.</span></div>

<div><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><div style="margin-top: 16px;"><a href="/esc?id=ticket&amp;table=incident&amp;sys_id=747a8c661c4722107f44dfbc9abe8fd4" style="background-color: #4F52BD;color: #ffffff;font-size: 16px;text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px;-webkit-border-radius: 4px;-moz-border-radius: 4px;display: inline-block;padding: 6px 16px 6px 16px;">View incident</a></div></span></div>
<div style="font-size: 20px; padding-top: 32px; padding-bottom: 16px; line-height: 30px;"><span style="font-weight: 600; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">About this incident</span></div>
<div style="padding-bottom: 32px;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Short description: <span style="font-weight: 600;">Critical Priority Network Incident Test #2</span><br><div>Opened by: <span style="font-weight:600">System Administrator</span></div>Urgency: <span style="font-weight: 600;">1 - High</span></span></div>
<div style="padding-bottom: 8px;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Thank you,</span><br><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Service Desk Team</span></div>
</div></td>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email"><sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><blind_copied/><body><html><head><style>
	#snc_notification_preference {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	
	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
</style>

</head><body><p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">A new <strong>CRITICAL PRIORITY NETWORK</strong> incident has been created:</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<ul style="list-style-position: inside;">
<li><strong><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Number: INC0010007</span></strong></li>
<li><strong><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Short description: Critical Priority Incident #3</span></strong></li>
<li><strong><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><a id="snc_uri_ref_link" href="https://kura-labs-jul-4728-0014.lab.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=incident.do%3Fsys_id=113b406a1c4722107f44dfbc9abe8fd6%26sysparm_stack=incident_list.do%3Fsysparm_query=active=true">LINK</a></span></strong></li>
</ul>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Please respond immediately.</span></p>

<br><br>

<a id="snc_notification_unsubscribe" href="mailto:?subject=Unsubscribe from &quot; Critical Incident Notification&quot;&amp;body=Sending this email with the predefined content in the subject and body will unsubscribe you from the notification &quot; Critical Incident Notification&quot;%0D%0A%0D%0AUnsubscribe:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;52c120ceb81622107f44046e3758c0da&quot;,&quot;token&quot;:&quot;c797e62132&quot;}">Unsubscribe</a> | <a id="snc_notification_preference" href="https://kura-labs-jul-4728-0014.lab.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=notification_preferences.do%3Fsysparm_notification=52c120ceb81622107f44046e3758c0da">Notification Preferences</a><div>&nbsp;</div><div style="display:inline">Ref:MSG0000703_BgMdWUcuvEuMmqaSVS2v</div></body></html></body><body_text/><checkpoint>0</checkpoint><content_type>text/html</content_type><copied/><deleted>false</deleted><direct>brendan.qin@example.com,brice.hedglin@example.com,bradly.hasselvander@example.com,alyssa.biasotti@example.com,alva.pennigton@example.com,amelia.caputo@example.com,brent.vaidya@example.com,brant.darnel@example.com,jacklyn.emayo@example.com,amos.linnan@example.com,karla.ken@example.com</direct><error_string/><headers>X-ServiceNow-Source:Notification-52c120ceb81622107f44046e3758c0da

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email"><sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><blind_copied/><body><html><head><style type="text/css">
	* {
		-webkit-text-size-adjust: none;
	}

	body {
		margin: 0 auto !important;
		padding: 0 !important;
		font-family: Lato, Arial, sans-serif;
	}

	.btn a {
		text-decoration: none;
	}

	.btn.inverse a {
		color: #fff;
	}

	#requestapprove a {
		color: #fff !important;
	}

	span.footer,
	#templateAddress,
	#templateCopyright,
	#templateCopyright *,
	#templateAddress * {
		margin: 0;
		font-size: 14px;
		line-height: 18px;
		color: #ffffff;
	}

	#snc_notification_unsubscribe,
	#snc_notification_preference {
		color: #3C59E7;
		font-size: 16px;
		line-height: 19px;
	}

	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		padding-right: 8px;
	}

	#snc_notification_preference {
		padding-left: 8px;
	}

	body,
	table,
	td,
	p,
	a {
		-ms-text-size-adjust: 100% !important;
		-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100% !important;
	}

	table,
	tr,
	td {
		border-spacing: 0 !important;
		mso-table-lspace: 0 !important;
		mso-table-rspace: 0 !important;
		border-collapse: collapse !important;
		mso-line-height-rule: exactly !important;
	}

	.ExternalClass * {
		line-height: 100%;
	}

	.mobile-link a,
	.mobile-link span {
		text-decoration: none !important;
		color: inherit !important;
		border: none !important;
	}
</style>
</head><body><div style="margin: 0 auto !important;" align="center">
<table class="w100" style="width: 600px; background-color: #f7f7f9; margin: 0 auto !important; padding: 0px;" border="0" width="600" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" bgcolor="#F7F7F9">
<tbody>
<tr>

</tr>
<tr>

<tr><!-- Left-->

<table width="18" cellspacing="0">

<td></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</td>
<!-- CONTAINER -->
<td width="564">
<table class="w100" style="background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom , rgba(39,40,74,1), rgba(247,247,249,0));margin: 0px; padding: 0px; box-shadow: 0px 2px 10px rgba(23, 40, 52, 0.08);" border="0" width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center">
<tbody>
<!-- Main Container -->
<tr>
<td class="pad-sides-20" style="border-radius:6px;text-align: left; background-color: #ffffff; padding: 24px 24px 24px 24px;" align="center"><div style="font-family: lato, arial, sans; line-height: 24px; font-size: 16px;">
<div style="text-align: center; line-height: 36px; padding-bottom: 24px; border-bottom: 1px solid #DADDE2;"><span style="font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color: #181a1f;">Incident has been assigned to Networking Operations</span></div>
<div style="padding-top: 24px; padding-bottom: 16px;"><div style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-weight: 700; color: #181A1F">INC0010007</span><span style="font-weight: 400;"> was recently assigned to </span><span style="font-weight: 700;">Networking Operations</span><span style="font-weight: 400;"> group.</span></div></div>
<div style="padding-bottom: 32px;"><span style="font-size: 16px; color:#181A1F;">You can view the incident to track updates and make changes.</span><br><a href="itsm_email_notification_redirect.do?sysparm_table=incident&amp;sysparm_sysId=113b406a1c4722107f44dfbc9abe8fd6&amp;sysparm_type=record&amp;sysparm_param=%7B%22table%22%3A%22incident%22%2C%22sysId%22%3A%22113b406a1c4722107f44dfbc9abe8fd6%22%7D" style="background-color: #4F52BD;border: 1px solid #4F52BD;color: #ffffff;font-size: 16px;text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px;-webkit-border-radius: 4px;-moz-border-radius: 4px;display: inline-block;padding: 6px 16px;margin-top:16px;">View incident</a></div>
<div><div style="font-size: 20px; padding-bottom: 16px; line-height: 30px;"><span style="font-weight:600;">About this incident</span></div><div style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Short description: </span><span style="font-weight: 600;">Critical Priority Incident #3</span></div><div style="font size:16px; color:#161B1C; face-family:lato" ;><span style=" font-weight:400;">Caller: </span><span style="font-weight: 600;">Don Goodliffe</span><br><span style=" font-weight:400;">Category: </span><span style="font-weight: 600;">Network</span><br><span style=" font-weight:400;">Urgency: </span><span style="font-weight: 600;">1 - High</span><br><span style=" font-weight:400;">Priority: </span><span style="font-weight: 600;">1 - Critical</span><br></div></div>
<div style="padding-top: 32px; padding-bottom: 8px; font-weight: 400;">Thank you,<br>Service Desk Team</div>
</div></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</td>
<!-- END CONTAINER --> <!-- Right-->
<td valign="top" width="18">

</tr>
<!-- Footer started -->
<tr style="background-color: #27284a;">
<td>
<table style="background-color: #27284a;" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tbody>
<tr>
<td style="background-color: #27284a;" height="36"></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="background-color: #27284a;" align="center" valign="top" height="38"><img style="height: 20px;" src="email_template_now_logo.png" height="20"></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="background-color: #27284a; color: #fff;">
<table style="color: #fff;" border="0" width="600" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tbody>
<tr align="center">
<td><span id="templateAddress" class="footer" style="color: #ffffff; font-size: 12px; line-height: 18px; text-align: center; margin: 0 !important;"> 2225 Lawson Lane, Santa Clara, CA 95054, United States </span></td>
</tr>
<tr align="center">
<td><span id="templateCopyright" class="footer" style="color: #ffffff; font-size: 12px; line-height: 18px; text-align: center; margin: 0 !important;"> © 2025 ServiceNow Inc. All rights reserved. </span></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</td>
</tr>
<tr cellspacing="0">

</tr>
</tbody>

</td>
</tr>
<!-- Footer end--></tbody>
</table>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email"><sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><blind_copied/><body><html><head><style type="text/css">
	* {
		-webkit-text-size-adjust: none;
	}

	body {
		margin: 0 auto !important;
		padding: 0 !important;
		font-family: Lato, Arial, sans-serif;
	}

	.btn a {
		text-decoration: none;
	}

	.btn.inverse a {
		color: #fff;
	}

	#requestapprove a {
		color: #fff !important;
	}

	span.footer,
	#templateAddress,
	#templateCopyright,
	#templateCopyright *,
	#templateAddress * {
		margin: 0;
		font-size: 14px;
		line-height: 18px;
		color: #ffffff;
	}

	#snc_notification_unsubscribe,
	#snc_notification_preference {
		color: #3C59E7;
		font-size: 16px;
		line-height: 19px;
	}

	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		padding-right: 8px;
	}

	#snc_notification_preference {
		padding-left: 8px;
	}

	body,
	table,
	td,
	p,
	a {
		-ms-text-size-adjust: 100% !important;
		-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100% !important;
	}

	table,
	tr,
	td {
		border-spacing: 0 !important;
		mso-table-lspace: 0 !important;
		mso-table-rspace: 0 !important;
		border-collapse: collapse !important;
		mso-line-height-rule: exactly !important;
	}

	.ExternalClass * {
		line-height: 100%;
	}

	.mobile-link a,
	.mobile-link span {
		text-decoration: none !important;
		color: inherit !important;
		border: none !important;
	}
</style>
</head><body><div style="margin: 0 auto !important;" align="center">
<table class="w100" style="width: 600px; background-color: #f7f7f9; margin: 0 auto !important; padding: 0px;" border="0" width="600" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" bgcolor="#F7F7F9">
<tbody>
<tr>
<td style="background: #27284A; text-align: center; font-family: Arial, Tahoma, sans-serif; color: #425968; font-size: 13px; line-height: 14px;" align="center">
<table style="border-spacing: 0; width: 100%;" border="0" width="600" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tbody>
